Multi-Room Chat) using NodeJS

email also FB, Twitter, Instagram to 
use device location to see how spots 
and event are around their location. 
They can come to those place to 
checkin, write some reviews.

Coffee,.. 
Event can be a Music festival, 
Traditional festival, Picture Exhibition 
Also provide user to do group chat on 
any Spot or Event.
